column5: This may be a shock. Been going to see bob for 12 years now almost every weekend. I always said, bangers should be a food group. For those from the area, and those that knew him, especially before the new highway went in, knew what kind of man he truly was.  RIP Banger Bob!!  Me and my family will miss you.  http://m.northbaynipissing.com/news-story/5646751-banger-bob-leaves-big-hole-in-summer
rest in peace, so crazy i was just in emsdale for the first time over the weekend. Got a buddy who just moved there, too bad he will never get to try out the bangers.
I was a regular there when my parent's lived in Kearney.Bob didn't even mind if you brought a beer to wash down the Banger  He will be missed by lots  Rip Bob
